messages.subject: job licenses
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Melanie, It s good news that you will be coming to the States.  I don t know all the details about starting your own business, but I think there may be
messages.messageBody:
Hi Melanie,
It's good news that you will be coming to the States. I don't know all the
details about starting your own business, but I think there may be different
laws in different states.

A free resource you can use is the Better Business Bureau, they have a web
site but I'm afraid I don't know the addy. They can give you specific
information on how to start a small business, what licenses you might need,
phone numbers & addresses you might need, etc. And it's all free. I used
to work for them long ago, they have lots of info about lots of things, they
don't just register complaints and/or conduct mediation/arbritration.

Good luck on you move.
Cindy
